summary: The document is a memorandum from the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) records, released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It addresses a June 1978 request from the HSCA's Chief Counsel/Director, confirming the presence of information on a pseudonymously named individual, Marie L. PRIS ECB, within the Central Cover Staff (CCS) files, while noting the absence of information on other requested individuals. The memorandum also outlines its distribution list and classification details.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It responds to a specific request from the HSCA, indicating the presence of information on a pseudonymously named individual in CCS files.
No information was found in CCS files for other individuals mentioned in the request.
The document includes a detailed distribution list and classification markings.
